pages.text: Science or Magic? Try a bit of both!$(br)$(br)A house in your pocket, capsules are what made your complementary $(bold)Starter Hut$(reset) possible, $(italics)courtesy of Vulpine Co.$(br)$(br)No longer stationary, embrace the nomad lifestyle!
pages.title: Capsules

pages.text: Capsules come in different sizes.$(br)$(br)The starting size is determiend by the materials used to initially craft it.

To $(bold)upgrade$(reset) a capsule, combine it with a popped chorus fruit. This will increase the storage capacity of the capsule.$(br)$(br)Current technology allows you to upgrade a capsule up to 10 times.$(br)$(br)Capsules can also be dyed and re-labeled.
pages.title: Upgrading Capsules

pages.text: Mix a capsule with a glass bottle to create a $(bold)recovery$(reset) capsule to access the contents of the main capsule, in case you lose the capsule somehow!.$(br)$(br)No change will happen to the main capsule.$(br)$(br)The created one will be a$(br)one-time-use glass capsule.
pages.title: Capsule Backups
